text: The Venezuela women's national handball team is the national team of Venezuela. It is governed by the Federacion Venezolana de Balonmano and takes part in international handball competitions. ==Results== ===Pan American Championship=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !Round !Position !GP !W !D* !L !GS !GA |- | 2011||7th place match||8th||4||0||0||4||94||155 |- | 2013||7th place match||7th||6||2||0||4||176||197 |- | 2015 ||11th place match||11th||7||1||2||4||173||191 |} ===Caribbean Handball Cup=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |- !Year !Round !Position !GP !W !D* !L !GS !GA |- | 2017||6th place match||5||6||3||1||2||151||150 |} ===Bolivarian Games=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font- size:90%;" |- !Games !Round !Position ! ! ! ! ! ! |- style="background:#cfaa88;" | 2017 Santa Marta |round robin |3rd |5 |3 |0 |2 |199 |104 |} ==External links== *IHF profile Category:Women's national handball teams Handball National team
